Class WindowChrome

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.ui.chrome.WindowChrome
public final class WindowChrome extends Object
WindowChrome Utilities for borderless windows with rounded corners and drag handling. Features: - makeBorderlessWithRoundedCorners(JFrame): sets undecorated, transparent background, and keeps a rounded shape synced to window size using AppTheme.WINDOW_CORNER_ARC. - installDragHandler(JFrame, JComponent): makes the given component act as a drag handle. Notes: - This class is UI-agnostic; it does not impose a Lookinvalid input: '&Feel'. - Comments in English only.

  • Method Details

    • makeBorderlessWithRoundedCorners

      public static void makeBorderlessWithRoundedCorners(JFrame frame)
      Make the frame borderless and apply rounded corners. Safe to call once after frame content is set (before showing).

    • installDragHandler

      public static void installDragHandler(JFrame frame, JComponent dragHandle)
      Install a drag handler so dragging the given handle moves the frame. This is useful when the window is borderless.
